name: Power Bird
description:
Power Bird is an enhanced Flappy Bird game, where you will get power up as you fly. After all, you are a cute and powerful mechanical bird.

/// Features ///
  • Your energy are accumulating while flying, and you will get power up as soon as it reach some kind of max level (try it yourself!)
  • Discover a magical power up function after your bird fully charged up (maybe... not the "max" level haha)
  • Feel the cool art style and rough feeling that unlike the original cute flappy bird
  • BE POWER UP!!!
/// Controls ///
  • Press Z / 〇  to flap
  • Press X / × to retry
/// Entries ///

This game is an entries for Finish Your Game Jam. It may received update new a few days or more. Hope you enjoy your journey with the bird.
